atten3.ptxt: After turning the ignition switch off, waiting time may be required before disconnecting the cable from the battery terminal. Therefore, make sure to read the disconnecting the cable from the battery terminal notice before proceeding with work (See page ).

s-1.ptxt: DISCONNECT CABLE FROM NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

atten3.ptxt: When disconnecting the cable, some systems need to be initialized after the cable is reconnected (See page ).

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE CENTER LOWER INSTRUMENT CLUSTER FINISH PANEL

s2.ptxt: Put protective tape around the center lower instrument cluster finish panel.
Using a moulding remover, detach the 3 claws and 2 clips and remove the center lower instrument cluster finish panel.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE CENTER INSTRUMENT CLUSTER FINISH PANEL ASSEMBLY

s3.ptxt: Detach the 4 claws and disconnect the air conditioning control.
Disconnect the connectors and remove the center instrument cluster finish panel.
Disconnect the connectors and remove the center instrument cluster finish panel.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE RADIO RECEIVER ASSEMBLY WITH BRACKET

s2.ptxt: Disconnect all the connectors and remove the radio receiver assembly with bracket.
Remove the 3 screws and No. 1 radio bracket from the radio receiver.
Remove the 3 screws and No. 2 radio bracket from the radio receiver.
